text:
I did find a small bug, there are some pages within HubSpot that it will trigger on that are not in the Design Manager. I’m aware of the issue and will fix it today.
:wink: this is why we beta test.
I’ve pushed the patch to fix the bug.  Again please send feedback :slightly_smiling_face:
lol I love how my funny picture shows up every time a github link is posted - makes my day :laughing:
I’m surprised Vidal Sassoon didn’t poach you

hahaha

It contrasts completely from your very refined professional shot in your slack
<@U6W3H6YN8> when you cut your hair did you lose your powers?
<@U26DA9CQ0> yes, I am a very sad and weak person now

:laughing:
I don’t care who you are that is one of the all time best movies out there. There’s hardly a single line in that movie that isn’t awesomely quotable.

I will say this tab title change may have caused me to do things I shouldn’t. I now have like 5 DM tabs open at once for different sites. whereas before out of paranoia I’d be closing them so I didn’t accidentally overwrite my stuff
solution: ADD MORE SH!T TO THE EXTENSION! - lol could add a toggleable alert when you have more than x number of DM tabs ” do you really need all those open?”
Just reposting the extension’s url again as it’s gotten pretty burried <https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/HubSpot-developer-extensi/gebemkdecnlgbcanplbgdpcffpdnfdfo>
